New York University Archives
Ida Elizabeth Kopp Student Notebook
Kopp, Ida Elizabeth
MC.273
.25 linear feet in one volume
1927-1932 Ida Elizabeth Kopp was a night student at New York University's School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance (later known as the Leonard N. Stern School of Business) from approximately 1926 through 1932. She was the only daughter of an immigrant couple from Germany and Switzerland. She graduated with a Bachelor's degree and later worked as a secretary to the President of Stauffer Chemical Company located in the Graybar Building of Grand Central Station. This collection consists of Kopp's student notebook from her classes at NYU from roughly 1927 through 1932. Materials are in English. 1
Scope and Contents
This collection consists of Ida Elizabeth Kopp's student notebook from her classes at the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from roughly 1927 through 1932.
Biographical / Historical
Ida Elizabeth Kopp was a night student at New York University's School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance (later known as the Leonard N. Stern School of Business) from approximately 1926 through 1932. She was the only daughter of an immigrant couple from Germany and Switzerland. She graduated with a Bachelor's degree and later worked as a secretary to the President of Stauffer Chemical Company located in the Graybar Building of Grand Central Station.
Arrangement
This collection consists of one item and has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Conditions Governing Access
Open for use without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
New York University Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2646
E-mail: university-archives@nyu.edu
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Barbara C. Sampson, Kopp's daughter, in March 2017. The accession number associated with this gift is 2017.010.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Ida Elizabeth Kopp Student Notebook; MC 273; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning, the item was described at the collection- and item-level. The item underwent basic mold treatment and was rehoused in October 2017.
Notebooks Business students Leonard N. Stern School of Business
